component.text:
Activity

Determine the router ID for each router and the designated router for each network.
The Email Server runs server software and clients use their mail client software, such as Microsoft outlook, to access Email on the server.
1. For each Router, select the IP address that will be used for the router ID.
2. For each Network, select the router that will be elected as the designated router.
You have successfully determined the router ID and designated router. Click Next to continue.
Review the concept of Router ID and Designated Router and try again.
Review the concept of Router ID and Designated Router and try again.
Review the concept of Router ID and Designated Router and try again.
